greet: Hi! How can I help you
Hi! Tell me what you need today

responses: Sorry! This is beyond scope of my work.
Sorry! I cannot help you with that
Sorry! I did not understand that
beyondScope.action: Do you like to see our product catalog. Mention briefly what products offers

suspensions.description: Designed for passenger cars, these shock absorbers provide a smooth ride and improved handling in rocky terrain. They feature a twin-tube design and are engineered to meet or exceed OEM specifications.
This shock absorber is designed for vehicles that require a firmer ride and superior grip. It features a gas-charged design that helps to reduce fade and improve performance.

Known for their durability and performance, Bilstein B6 shocks are ideal for both on-road and off-road applications with high endurance and low impact shocks. They provide excellent handling and stability.
These lowering springs improve handling and reduce body roll while providing a more aggressive stance. They are designed to work with OEM shocks and struts.
This control arm assembly is designed to restore the original ride height and handling of your vehicle. It includes pre-installed bushings for easy installation.

brakes.description: High-performance ceramic brake pads designed for reduced noise and dust.
Premium quality rotors that enhance cooling and improve braking performance.
High endurance calipers with a 1-year warranty, ensuring reliable performance
High endurance hydraulics with a 2-year warranty, ensuring stable and long performance
High performance ABS with a 2-year warranty, ensuring stable and long performance

batteries.description: A high-performance starting battery with a spill-proof design, ideal for vehicles with high electrical demands
A reliable battery with a longer lifespan and enhanced starting power, suitable for various vehicle types
An absorbed glass mat (AGM) battery that provides superior performance and durability, perfect for start-stop vehicles.
A robust battery designed for heavy-duty applications, offering excellent starting power and vibration resistance.
A premium AGM battery that delivers high cycling capabilities and is designed for extreme conditions

clutches.description: This kit includes a clutch disc, pressure plate, and release bearing. It is designed for standard passenger vehicles.
A high-performance clutch kit designed for sports cars and modified vehicles. It offers improved torque capacity and quicker engagement.
This kit is designed for heavy-duty applications, suitable for trucks and commercial vehicles. It provides enhanced durability and performance under load.
A single organic clutch disc suitable for everyday driving. It offers smooth engagement and is ideal for standard vehicles.
A ceramic clutch disc designed for high-performance applications. It can handle higher temperatures and is ideal for racing or heavy-duty use.
A high-quality release bearing compatible with various clutch kits. It ensures smooth operation and longevity.

radiators.description: High-performance aluminum radiator designed for Honda Civic models. It features a lightweight design and improved cooling efficiency.

radiators.brand: Copper Brass Radiator for Ford F-150
radiators.description: Durable copper-brass radiator that provides excellent heat dissipation. Compatible with various Ford F-150 models.

radiators.brand: Plastic Tank Radiator for Toyota Corolla
radiators.description: A cost-effective plastic tank radiator that fits Toyota Corolla models. It is designed for easy installation and reliable performance.
A high-capacity performance radiator for Chevrolet Silverado, designed to handle increased heat loads and improve engine performance.

radiators.brand: OEM Replacement Radiator for Nissan Altima
radiators.description: Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) replacement radiator for Nissan Altima, ensuring a perfect fit and reliable operation.

transmissions.description: A high-performance fluid designed for automatic transmissions, providing excellent lubrication and protection.
Includes a filter and gasket for various automatic transmission models, ensuring optimal performance and longevity.
Fully remanufactured transmission units for popular car models, tested for quality and performance.
An aftermarket transmission cooler designed to reduce transmission temperatures and improve performance.
Complete clutch kits including pressure plate, disc, and release bearing for various manual transmission vehicles.
High-quality torque converters designed to improve engine performance and fuel efficiency in automatic transmissions.

headlights.description: High-intensity LED headlight bulbs with a lifespan of up to 30,000 hours. They provide bright white light and are energy-efficient.
Standard halogen bulbs that offer reliable performance and are easy to install. Available in various wattages.
High-intensity discharge (HID) kits that provide a brighter and more focused beam. Includes all necessary components for installation.
Aftermarket projector headlights that enhance visibility and give a modern look to vehicles. Available for various car models.
LED daytime running lights that improve vehicle visibility during the day. Easy to install and energy-efficient.

response: Sorry! We provide only the mentioned products

orders.items: Ask for how many items you want?

orders.deliveryCharge: Mention the delivery cost which will be atmost 10% of total cost

orders.totalcost: display total cost of order before proceeding to checkout

orders.address: Ask for address in one line

orders.creditcard: ask for only credit card number

payment.ordernumber: generate an order number of 5 digits but hide abstraction; dont' mention any different message
payment.deliverydate: generate a delivery date with human readable format which will give a date which if after around the range October 20 - October 30 2024

greet: Please tell me your order number
orderstatus.lastName: Thanks. Please tell your last name
orderstatus.productSnap: Please include product image along with your query

refund.apology: Sorry for any incovenience. We will initiate refund of the damaged product/parcel immediately

replace.apology: Sorry for any incovenience. We will initiate replacement of the product/parcel immediately. Mention the reason

escalteAgent.apology: There is no visible defect in the product that you received or a major damage in the shipping box. Please call 1-800-234-5678 for firther assistance

fraudTransaction.refund: issue for refund if order number is missing, Last Name is missing, or credit card last 4 digits is missing. Mention which reason
fraudTransaction.decline: mention transaction is proper if last name is valid, and order number is valid, and credit card number is valid.
fraudTransaction.escalteAgent: for unknown image and beyond the scope queries, escalate to agent and ask to call on 1-800-234-5678 for further assistance
